title: Happy New Year 2022 from ICE/IAMOT 2022 Conference
description: First of all, we wish you all the best for this new year, health, happiness and wonderful surprises.
contents:
Figure 1: Photo by Sincerely Media on Unsplash



Dear ICE-IAMOT Community members,
First of all, we wish you all the best for this new year, health, happiness, and wonderful surprises.
Despite the ongoing uncertainties and contingencies resulting from the evolving pandemic, we continue to work hard to ensure a quality and informative ICE-IAMOT 2022 conference.
To address some of the questions from community members regarding online participation, we remind you that from the beginning we have considered the conference a hybrid event. This means that all accepted research could be presented either in person or remotely. In any case, whatever the situation next June, we are sure that our dynamic communities will have a dedicated space to exchange and discuss how engineering, innovation and technology management could significantly contribute to address the challenges our society is facing today.
Thank you very much for your understanding and support,
The Organizing Committee Chair, Pr. Laure Morel, Pr. Mauricio Camargo, Dr.Â Laurent Dupont

title: Welcome
contents:
Welcome to the ICE/ IAMOT 2022 joint Conference website the ERPI team in Nancy is working to provide you an innovative experience in the city of Nancy in 2022.
the website and the conference program are being update regularly, we will keep you informed on any update.
